author: StefanTitze
body:
I am not able to enter most of the cyrillic letters in uppercase into the console window. All Lowercase letters are working:

Serbian:

ЉЊЕРЗУИОППЂ
AДГЈКЛЋЖ
ЅЏБНМ

Russian:

ЙУКЕНГЗ
ЫВАПРОЛДЖЭ
МИЬБЮ

This problem does not occur with the PowerShell 5.1 console window.

Regards


Stefan Titze

-----
Windows 10 x64 1803 17134.407
PowerShell 6.1.1

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Can you check after unload PSReadline?

comments.author: StefanTitze
comments.body:
The problem is solved when I’m unloading PSReadline.
